fsm_info_ht:
['Page 10:
[¬s]" in math, nongrouped students have somewhat lower average SES."
"High-ability-group students are also much higher on SES[¬e]"', 'Page 9:
[¬s]" A composite SES term was constructed by combining information from indices of parental education, occupa\xad tion, and household possessions. Parental ed\xad ucation was measured by taking the highest degree earned by either spouse; parental oc\xad cupation was measured by taking the highest Duncan socioeconomic index score for the husband's and wife's occupations.
